root.title: Sysmon Configuration Error
root.description: Detects when an adversary is trying to hide it's action from Sysmon logging based on error messages
root.author: frack113

key.name: Description|contains
key.item: Failed to open service configuration with error
Failed to connect to the driver to update configuration

key.name: Description|contains|all
key.item: Failed to open service configuration with error
Last error: The media is write protected.

key.name: Description|contains
key.item: Failed to open service configuration with error 19
Failed to open service configuration with error 93
